definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: The Wang Ran that sina science and technology negotiates to adjacent and royal Hua You for this seeks testimony.
sentences.chinese: 新浪科技爲此向接近盛大華友談判的王冉求證。

sentences.english: I didn't check this one out before I walked up here.
sentences.chinese: 這個我倒是沒有求證過。

sentences.english: The so-called"Palaeozoic melange"in Jilin Province appears to need further study.
sentences.chinese: 所謂的“混雜巖”，尚需進一步工作求證。

sentences.english: I took a photo of the pot with my cellphone for later verification.
sentences.chinese: 爲了求證，我用手機把這隻鍋拍了下來。

sentences.english: I am inclined to think that I could reinforce my argument by appealing to the feelings of chess-players themselves.
sentences.chinese: 我想我可以通過求證於棋手們自己來加強我的論證。

sentences.english: So scientists at Eotvos University in Budapest decided to do just that.
sentences.chinese: 所以布達佩斯厄特沃什大學的科學家決定做這個求證。

sentences.english: ” he clarified with the master thinking he was about to be told the esoteric secret to meditation.
sentences.chinese: 他向這個大師求證，以爲他聽到的是冥想的祕傳祕訣。

definition: to conceal/to hide (a taboo subject)/to cover up the truth
to declare to be untrue/to deny
to arrange an interview/an appointment (with the foreign ambassador)
to inspect and verify/experimental verification/to validate (a theory)/to authenticate
to post (an item on a forum)
